page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT IN ELMBRIDGE
page.content: Employment at Elmbridge is varied. Where farming is concerned it is a full time family owned business,many husband and wife work-teams. Few farmers wives work away from the farm. Many full time workers have been replaced by the use of contracted labour with machinery and the help of C B Radio ensuring speedy contact with farms to be worked. Agricultural transport,fruit farming and a mobile farrier are other locally run family businesses.Several people are self-employed working from offices at home. Of the people who work outside the area 15 miles is average travelled to work,these are mostly working professionally. There is little unemployment in this rural area.
